How does the specialized AlphaFold pipel: By using hybrid structural templates to improve prediction accuracy.
By incorporating real-time data from laboratory experiments.
By utilizing a larger dataset of known TCR:pMHC structures.
By applying machine learning algorithms to refine predictions.
What future improvement does the paper s: Incorporating multiple sequence alignments (MSAs) and exploring other binding affinity estimates.
Increasing the resolution of structural models used in predictions.
Developing new algorithms for faster computational processing.

What is a key limitation of AlphaFold-Mu: It does not perform well on antibody:antigen complexes.
It cannot predict protein folding pathways.
It is not compatible with high-throughput screening methods.
What is the primary focus of the paper r: The use of a specialized version of AlphaFold to predict TCR:peptide-MHC interactions.
The development of new experimental techniques for TCR:peptide-MHC interactions.
The analysis of genetic variations affecting TCR:peptide-MHC interactions.
The study of evolutionary patterns in TCR:peptide-MHC interactions.
